law.text: The following definition applies in this chapter unless the context otherwise requires: "Building," in addition to its ordinary meaning, specifically includes any dwelling, hotel, commercial structure, automobile, truck, watercraft, aircraft, trailer, sleeping car, railroad car, or other structure or vehicle, or any structure with a valid certificate of occupancy.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 56, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 113, effective January 1, 1975.
